meanings.definition: Not performing at an expected or desired level.
meanings.sent1: The underactive computer took a long time to load the webpage.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with an underactive thyroid gland.
meanings.sent3: The underactive alarm clock decided to sleep in and not wake anyone up.
meanings.sent4: Her underactive imagination was like a dull pencil, unable to draw colorful pictures.
meanings.sent5: The underactive car engine sputtered and refused to start on the cold morning.

meanings.sent1: The underactive heater struggled to warm up the room.
meanings.sent2: The underactive economy faced challenges due to reduced consumer spending.
meanings.sent3: The underactive phone battery decided to take a nap instead of charging.
meanings.sent4: His underactive enthusiasm was like a deflated balloon at the party.
meanings.sent5: The underactive faucet dripped slowly, barely providing any water for washing hands.
